name: Survival Maze
detailed_description:
This game has rather simple graphics and based on Robinsonade idea. The main character is trapped in labyrinth which he must to find an exit from. He needs to find, to create, to use or to break objects in order to get closer to his target. It will not be easy taking into account limited resources and necessity to eat. If the main character dies, you would need to start the game again, however initial conditions will randomly vary. You should not hurry, since time goes only when the main character is moving, therefore use it to prepare the best possible plan.

Instruction
You target - Find Exit & Go (unravel the quest)

WASD = Move Hero;
Press Right Mouse Button + Drag Mouse = Rotate View;
Click Left Mouse Button = Take (right hand empty) or do something pointing at an object;
Space = Inventory + Craft;

Branch + Flint = Knife (bad);
Branch + Knife = Stick wood;
Stick wood + Flint = Knife;
Stick wood + Stone = Hammer (stone);
Stick wood + Flint = Axe;
Stone (3) + Pile wood = Boonfire;
Stick wood (2) + Knife = Tongs (wooden);

Combine - Drag Tongs in right hand and drag metal ore in Tongs;
You can crash Fence with Axe;
You can hack dead tree and pile of wood with Axe;
You can fire Bonfire with Flint;
You can heat up Metal Ore in Bonfire holding right hand Tongs with Metal Ore;
You can create Anvil in Bonfire holding Stone Hammer in right hand and Tongs with Metal Ore in the left one. You also need 2 pieces of Metal Ore in the cell as additional material;
You can create Metal Hammer and Metal Tongs in Anvil holding Stone Hammer in right hand and Wooden Tongs with molten ore in left one;
You can create Pickaxe in Anvil holding in right hand Hammer (metal), left hand Tongs (metal) with hardened metal ore;
You can crash Rock with Pickaxe;

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

  • Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM

  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
